price: روزی که همگان بانگِ هولناک [رستاخیز] را به‌حق می‌شنوند، [آن روز،] روزِ خروج [از گورها] است.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَسۡمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيۡحَةَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُرُوجِ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma yasmaʿūna al-ṣayḥata bil-ḥaqi dhālika yawmu al-khurūji
